Attributes.description: Analysis of modern Chinese grammar and its usage in various discourses, situating its form and function in relation to social and cultural contexts. Continuation of ASIA 386.
Attributes.prereq: Pre-reqs: ASIA 386. (or higher level of Chinese language proficiency.)
Attributes.date_buildings: Term: 2, Days: Wed, Start Time: 12:00, End Time: 15:00
